Reviews.Title: Good video, very durable camera
Reviews.Author: Robert C Vaughan

} // ]]> var cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8RollOverImg = new Image(); cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8RollOverImg.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81U7kmmI%2BQS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8currentClick) { return cv_mo28ITSXDLA2MI8currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:46 MinsI velcroed this to the bottom of my RC plane and took it out to a field, this is the shortest video I have but it gives a good indication of the quality. Definitely not HD, but good enough for less than $10 shipped. The video bounces a bit but there were six buzzards circling with me so I decided to dogfight them a little, the camera was pointed at a 30 degree angle so you don't see many of the buzzards.The durability of the camera is why I am reviewing it. After realizing it was a bit too much for my smaller plane, I noticed it had come loose at some point. two days of heavy rain later and I find it in my yard, pop the case open, give it 12 hours to dry out and it comes right on, I check the video and see how I lost it, it is behind me while I checked the plane, and as I see that it's gone, I step back to look around and step right on it, driving it into the grass further. But it is back in service and I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as pictured, instructions are poorly translated
Reviews.Author: Tech Guy
Reviews.Content: Mine arrived exactly as pictured, with a USB cable.You'll need to pick up a microSD card, and you're already on Amazon!Specs:720x480 AVI video format1280x1024 still image280mha 3.7v internal USB rechargeable battery.Instructions:Hold the bottom button down until the yellow light comes on.Hold the top button until it flashes 3 times.BadaBing! You're now taking a video.Press the bottom button to power off when done.Will be sticking this on RC cars, helicopters, ooo- 'The CatCam!'Have yet to find a way to turn off the date/time stamp.Deleting the contents of the TAG.TXT file or deleting the file itself won't do it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool
Reviews.Author: WillnOhio
Reviews.Content: I am happy to report that this cam is well made and works great. I was also impressed that it cost so little. It is well worth the money and could definitely come in handy. The instructions are horrible, but the functions are not hard to figure out. You will need to have a micro-sd card before it will work; otherwise, you can just use it as a web cam until you get a card. Works great as a web cam as well I must say.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good.
Reviews.Author: Ruben Lopez
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the video and audio quality of this small spy cam.  I used it at the office to catch a candy thief.  Left it on pointed at a candy bowl and no one even noticed it.  It recorded for 1 hour and 43 minutes before the battery died.  The included instructions are terrible, but it's not hard to figure out how to use it after you play with it for a bit.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: TimW1959
Reviews.Content: Some instructions on how to use it properly.But I purchased it to get a birds eye view from my rc helicopters.But this thing is so slick I can use it in hundreds of ways!NoOne knows you even have it!Video and audio and takes pictures as well!For under $20. you really can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Be carefull inserting memory card
Reviews.Author: Norman Reynolds "owner, Victory Photos"
Reviews.Content: I've done some test shooting with mine, seems to work OK if there is a moderate amount of light.Be very carefull when you insert the mini-SD Card. If you aren't  you will jam it above the SD slot and it will vanish into the hull of the camera. This happened to me. I inserted the mini-SD, it vanished. I had to take the keychain camera apart by removing two mini-phillips head screws, then retreive the card. I reinserted it, screwed it back up, and it works fine.Read the reviews here about instructions, the Chi-com instructions which come with it are funny but useless.I will update this review when I use the product more,but so far so good.UPDATE: Dec. 02, 2012Used this as a "nanny cam" to keep an eye on sitter. Quality of videos really great for the 10 bucks you pay.This was in a bright room, quality will probably degrade in a darker room. Sound quality good too. I can't figure out how to set the correct date, but WTF. I may buy another, nice product. I can't figure out how to take a "photo" with it, but I only got it for video so I don't care. Easy to download it with the mini>normal usb cord included. Just go to  "My Computer" and it shows up as a drive in Windows 7 on a PC. I've played my vids in Real Player with no issues.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Wilson "smith john"
Reviews.Content: I had a chance the other day when I had a friend , who I was driving with have a small car wreck ! I used it to tape the damage to both cars and also take the pic of the other guys car plates . its a good thing i did he did not wait for police and I was able to give a copy of video to the cops found  out today the guy was wanted great little gadget !!also if you have any questions about it the seller is very gracious and answers all your questions in a very timely manner . I will buy from them again

Reviews.Title: Cool Idea - Horrible image quality
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I bought this product based on the Video Review submitted, as it looked pretty decent for $10.  However, the only way my quality came close to his was on a bright day and holding the camera completely still.  Any movement would blur the video.  How he strapped his to an RC plane and got that quality - I don't know.  Indoors, forget about it!  Even after bringing out my studio lighting - the images were dark.  It looked like a webcam from the early 90's.I can see how some people could fall in love with this, after all, its a camera in a remote control and its only $10.  I was hoping to use it to record my daughter doing silly stuff in situations where bringing out my real digi cam would distract her, but this product isn't going to work.If you're still reading this review, maybe you're serious enough to appreciate the following information.  After doing more research I found one of these Remote Cams that actually record in True HD.  Its called an 808 #11.  Apparently there are several companies that manufacture these and all but one use the SD imaging.  It's more expensive, about $35, but Im sure with HD resolution this is a cool product.  I didn't find any on Amazon, only Ebay.The only plus side - I bought two of these, and doubled my money selling them on Craigslist!  If you dare to try it and hate it, I suggest doing the same thing!

Reviews.Title: Nice little toy
Reviews.Author: Santick
Reviews.Content: Got the camera fast, looks cheap on the outside but does the job.images are very goodviedos are very goodmanual sucks. The translation from chinese to english sucks.Took me a little to figure how to operate.for that price its very good item.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap little camera
Reviews.Author: Busy Dad of 6
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with this little camera.  The directions are not very good, but it does not take long to figure out.  The video is not HD, but for the price it's not bad.I have strapped it onto my syma x1 and it lifts it with no problems at all.Only problem I had at first was the sd card falling into the camera, but was easy enough to get out.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: JOEL CURRY
Reviews.Content: if it came with a micro sd card would have got a 5 star ratingother than that it is great

Reviews.Title: Jerky video, don't buy
Reviews.Author: furnic
Reviews.Content: Doesn't really work that well, which is a pity, as inbetween the jerks the quality of the image is actually quite ok, but it is impossible to use or watch as you will get 2 seconds of video then a pause and then 2 seconds of video and so on.Anyhow it doesn't cost much but its still a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Nice, consistent, 1.5 hours recording.
Reviews.Author: douglas machado
Reviews.Content: Nice cam, battery is not that great, video quality is nice as well.I would recommend this to anyone. fv

Reviews.Title: Video quality not good
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: The video quality is not good......any movement will make the video blurry..........not good in low light.  ok for daylight recording

Reviews.Title: Cheap, you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: A. Benvenuto "GuguiNEO"
Reviews.Content: This camera comes, as many cheap chinese products, with the WORSE translated - documente - technical instructions, they are USELESS. I'm still figuring out how to record rather than take pictures with it.  Regarding the resolution of the images IT IS BAD. Its a less than VGA quality "extended to a HD screen size",  Just because it cost me less than 15$ I feel I wasn't ripped off.  YOU GET WAT YOU PAID FOR.

Reviews.Title: Cheap product
Reviews.Author: Edison Arciniegas
Reviews.Content: bad quality product. try placing sd memory and memory went outside the slot and I had to disassemble the camera to remove the sd.

Reviews.Title: PURE TRASH. RIPOFF! SAVE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: Josephb76 "Josephb76"
Reviews.Content: By the packaging, when I received the unit I realized that this company appeared to be the same company that sold me the video dvr watch a few months ago. Like the watch, this unit didn't record video. Only audio. It was worthless. That makes two out of two bad products from overseas. Gee, what a surprise. But not as  big of a surprise as to why Amazon doesn't vet these bogus importers that are scams. I don't bother with refunds because, chances are, I'll never see a refund or the defective product again if I try sending it back.It's shameful and unresolvable.DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT WHATSOEVER. DON'T LET THE CHEAP "what the heck" PRICE TEMPT YOU. It's trash.I'll attest to it.

Reviews.Title: Broke almost immediately, and it's quite obvious it's a camera. Not a "spy" device in the slightest.
Reviews.Author: Charles Edward Smith
Reviews.Content: Worked for about 15 seconds, and then stopped. Won't charge, doesn't show up as mass storage, and none of the lights work. Completely dead. Plus it in no way looks like an actual key fob. Nobody would be fooled by this, a quick glance tells you it's not a normal fob, and if you're trying to be covert the moment someone takes a closer look you'll be busted.If a cop can easily tell it's a recording device (and they're not exactly the brightest), then it doesn't qualify as a spy camera.

Reviews.Title: Very low profile
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: this really does look just like a car alarm controller and it works just fine as if you were taking pics and video with a low end phone. The slot where the memory card is alittle detached from the case and it is very easy to lose a memory card inside that space so be careful and the camera faces slightly to the left and a bit up so you should compansate for that when aiming to capture something. the instructions suck but it is easy to figure out if you spend alittle time looking at what you caught and when.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is junk. Don't waste your time or money. Send a little more on quality product that may actually work.

Reviews.Title: Great For the Price
Reviews.Author: Poi Sen Pen
Reviews.Content: Ok. So not an 808 #11 or #16. Definitely not a Mobius. But for eight bucks? Fun to play around with.

Reviews.Title: Works just about as advertised...
Reviews.Author: Tom "I am a 79 year old retired business man....
Reviews.Content: ...but could be a bit more intuitive.  Takes about the quality pictures and video you would expect for that price.  Can't complain about that, knew going in what it was.  But lots of fun to play with, and still working after several months.

Reviews.Title: So far it's been good for me!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I was wanting a micro cheap camera that I could secure to my R/C planes and this was exactly what I was looking for! It works very well and I was able to get some decent footage at times. I feel like they should have centered the camera a little better. I never really seem to get an in-frame video. It seems that they designed the lens to be slightly zoomed in a little bit to get better videos from far away, but it's terrible for upclose and close encounters.

Reviews.Title: Learn Some English
Reviews.Author: colten
Reviews.Content: When I got it, the directions are the worst english I've ever seen, didn't know how to work it. So, I had to look up a video on youtube and find which button is which. Once I learned how It worked pretty good!P.S. Does not come with a microUSB, have to buy it separate.

Reviews.Title: Micro camera
Reviews.Author: Pup
Reviews.Content: Could not get the captured video to playback, do not know if it is the Macbook or the micro camera?

Reviews.Title: Keyfob Camera
Reviews.Author: Flip Flops Forever
Reviews.Content: This little camera is just what I was looking for!  It takes great pictures for it's size.  I use have used it on an airplane and a quad-copter.  It is small and light wieght and easy to attach with just  a rubber band.  Needs plenty of light and not to close to subject.  Outside, is where it really shines.  Takes great aerial videos.Good luck with the instructions.  Find someone that has already been there or knows Chinese.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The cam works fine. It loses charge so fast even if when you are not using it. You cannot tell when it is recording or not. When you put it in your pocket, it will record your pocket but for the price I would say I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: this item is doesnt work
Reviews.Author: meni
Reviews.Content: Don't bother with this item , it doesnt work. It is a waste of money .Not a good buy at all.

Reviews.Title: No Video
Reviews.Author: R. Altman
Reviews.Content: Tried 3 different SD cards and the playback says something like "audio file available".  The screen stays black and I can hear a little background audio.  Even though it only cost $10 I'm sending it back and getting a refund.  Maybe he'll quit selling junk if enough people write reviews and request their money back.

Reviews.Title: Much better picture than expected, But, cuts off unexpectedly with memory and batter left?
Reviews.Author: Danny Langford
Reviews.Content: The video quality was much better than expected, but often just stops recording for no reason.  With a full charge and a hgh capacity memory card it should record for at least a couple of hours, but this one always cuts off after 5-20 minutes.  Still, it's saved me from "Verbal Contracts" being broken or ignored several times.  Good to have a record regardless of admissibility in your state.

Reviews.Title: Best small camera
Reviews.Author: John Campbell
Reviews.Content: Records very well and very clear no one ever knows you have it. Quickest camera ever. Good quality and resolution.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Exceptional video quality.
Reviews.Author: DM
Reviews.Content: Yes the instructions are a little poor, but not that complicated to operate at all. The video is fantastic especially considering the price and size of the camera. Press and hold the front button until the yellow light comes on. Then for still pictures, press the back button once, "click" you just took a photo. Continue this same process for additional still photos. For video, press and hold the back button until the yellow light flashes three times, you are now recording video. to stop the video recording, press and hold the back button again until the yellow light flashes another three times. Then you can repeat the same processes again. Simply put, the front button is the on/off switch and the back button controls the photo and video operation. The battery seems to operate the camera for at least 20-25 minutes of continuous video recording. However there is no way to really know when the battery is charged when plugged in. To obtain a full charge. Leave it plugged in for one and a half to two hours. As a side note you should allow the battery to die first before charging again. Constantly plugging the camera in will decrease the battery life significantly. Overall it is a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Shaun-Paul Sicard
Reviews.Content: So i bought this to mount on my Mini Super Cub RC plane and first flight out i took a nose dive,  BAM! I thought the camera would be done.  At the end of the day, i checked to see if it still work.  Plugged it in and got my video.  GREAT!  The video quality to very good for its small size.  The picture quality wasn't impressive, but overall this product did the job and can handle some damage. Thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Spy Car Remote Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Absolutely wonderful and it's good quality for a small pint size hidden video.  It does the job and presents a low key spy.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great.. (Provided USB cord is dangerous DO NOT USE!!!)
Reviews.Author: Fred Devico
Reviews.Content: Camera works great. Quality of photo's and videos are about a 7 on a scale of 1 -10. But for the price it does what it's designed to do. Audio pick up is excellent and very sensitive. The USB cord when used started to get hot and smoke!!!!. I used one of my own and it charged fine. The provided cord obviously had a short of some sort so I wouldn't use the cord provided with the camera and risk a fire or damage to your USB port on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Hidden camera remote
Reviews.Author: Vernon Siders Jr. "SSgt Inspiration"
Reviews.Content: I love gadgets and gizmos...this just adds to my collection and expertise in the field of covert activities.  Here we go! "bleep-bleep"

Reviews.Title: Uhh yes!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: When discrete recording is what you're looking for, this will do. Very poor in low light and only about 30fps so no fast action. Card capacity is about 8gigs.

Reviews.Title: So disappointed... at least it was cheap
Reviews.Author: Illianna Dahl
Reviews.Content: This item was a huge disappointment.-It's easy to confuse buttons and not capture footage.-SD slot is easy to miss causing you to put the SD card into the body of the camera-Time stamp is NOT removable on original footageThis item went from a piece of business equipment to a toy for my children

Reviews.Title: great deal for $5. Im satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Mayhall "maxstarr"
Reviews.Content: works as advertised. pic and sound r ok quality.  but great deal for $5. no problems yet. instructions r fine as well

Reviews.Title: Great for the $!
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: Great for the money, video quality is *ok*.. I taped it to a little quadcopter and it did pretty well, even after taking a pretty hard shot to the concrete from about 40 feet... :)

Reviews.Title: THE Tom G official reviews
Reviews.Author: THE Tom G
Reviews.Content: Its good and cheap small and cheap :) im happy just getting it for that i would have expected to pay more.[...]

Reviews.Title: handy little camera, slightly impractical
Reviews.Author: Kevin M Davidson
Reviews.Content: works as intended, records a bit further out than expected, so you need about 3 ft of clearance to get proper shots. usually not a problem but important to note

Reviews.Title: its ok for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Video works however audio doesn't . easy enough to use and very discreet.  purchased another one from another seller and hopefully better luck in quality

Reviews.Title: Instruction written in poor English, still unable to make work!
Reviews.Author: David Camp
Reviews.Content: The instructions were written in such poor English, unable to operate, additional instruction requested, but went unanswered. Should have returned!

Reviews.Title: Need Instructions!
Reviews.Author: John Gallagher "gldrgidr"
Reviews.Content: The tiny instruction sheet that comes with this video camera is poorly translated into English and does not tell enough to be able to use this.  I found some videos on youtube that helped but I still haven't gotten this to work.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: ahk
Reviews.Content: Charged it for 5 hours as instructed. Tryed to turn it on, the light blinked a few times, but thats all it did. Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: This is a good one
Reviews.Author: YFM "YM"
Reviews.Content: I did not expect too much about this, but it does work fine.Just work.And able to download to PC.Fine.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: charlie johnson
Reviews.Content: very very good thank you i really thankful for your sevice and i really apreciate your compromise thank yoou !

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: DARYL L WOODMAN
Reviews.Content: Great idea, but it did not deliver.I was excited about surprising my son with this by attaching it to our RC helicopter.I plugged it in--no light came on.I reset it, plugged in, then not, I did the hokey pokey and finally the light came on. After hours of charging, I unplugged it and it would not start. I plugged it back in again and no light. Once all the planets aligned, the light came on, and then promptly went off again. I measured the voltage on the battery, and clearly it was able to hold a charge, so the device was defective, not the power supply. It has great potential, if only it were backed by better quality control. I did return the device at no charge easily, and I have been reimbursed--so for that I thank the company. It was worth the gamble for $8.50.I still want one, at least my son does. Maybe I'll try again, or from a different vendor. I didn't expect it to last, but if it had worked for even a couple of hours/days, it would have been worth the money.

Reviews.Title: NO Quality Control
Reviews.Author: Tiger C
Reviews.Content: This guy send you a broken one.  It is not function out of the box.  I will not buy from this guy again!  Totally waste my time and money!!!

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: Allan H. F. Palmer "Allan Palmer"
Reviews.Content: this product is inexpensive and is worth the couple of dollars I spend on it. I recommend it, it has its limitations but it is ok.

Reviews.Title: Tinny gadget
Reviews.Author: AH
Reviews.Content: It's as discrete as it can be. Only you know it's a camera. The quality of the video it's fair given the size of the camera. No HD tough. It should have a motion sensor mechanism. It arrived on time

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Herman
Reviews.Content: I was a little shaky about this purchase at first with all the bad reviews saying its cheap and it doesn't work but all you really need is pacience. You need a micro SD card first of all and sometimes you have to read the instructions. It came with two pairs of constructions. The white strip is the best. Very simple. Overall im really satisfied with the product

Reviews.Title: It works, but it is hard to see if it is recording
Reviews.Author: Ed T
Reviews.Content: It works, but it is hard to see if it is recording. The light should tell you if it is recording or if it is ready to take pictures, so it is very hard to use. The size is small enough, but it doesn't seem to be very well made.

Reviews.Title: Cheapo GoPro?
Reviews.Author: semilla
Reviews.Content: You won't get a high frame rate or awesome resolution with this camera, but you can strap it to your sister's helmet while she is jumping her horse and take cool videos without offering your right arm as payment for a GoPro system.  Rubber bands and paper clips not included for attachment.

Reviews.Title: bad instructions
Reviews.Author: edwin
Reviews.Content: The instructions are poorly written. its quality is cheap. I could not get mine to work properly. maybe my unit was defective but I could not turn the unit on as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Nifty Little Camera
Reviews.Author: tyrdz
Reviews.Content: The camera lens is on the edge of the case so you cannot let the camera case just hang from the key chain and record. The operation is erratic, when the record button is pressed to snap a photo, or to record video, the status lights do not always stay on, so it is difficult to comprehend the status of the camera, until it is attached to a computer for viewing of the pictures. It is more of a toy than a serious recording device. The first obstacle was knowing where and how to insert the battery. It was necessary to open up the case to see what position the battery should be in.

Reviews.Title: Not the best product but hey, it works
Reviews.Author: William Zettler
Reviews.Content: I had to get one to see what the hype was all about. Unit does GOOD in light outside, in dark, dimly lit areas it fails.. It is always ZOOMED IN so if you hide it to watch someone you have to make sure you put it way back. Sound is a 8 out of 10, video is a 6-7 depending what lighting your in. The brighter the light the better. Honestly unless you REALLY need to spy on someone don't waste your money on this. Get a better quality unit. This unit hides well but you can spend a little more and get a better quality unit that is slightly bigger for the cash and works better then this.

Reviews.Title: not quite what I expected
Reviews.Author: Ralph Williams
Reviews.Content: camera works but doesn't do well in low light or record for lenght of time advertised. does very good in regular light

Reviews.Title: Not bad...
Reviews.Author: D. Francis
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for.  Check out the youtube video for instructions on how to use because the set that came with it weren't very good at all.

Reviews.Title: Spy Hidden Micro Camera / CCTV Car Remote Key Style
Reviews.Author: WALLEYE22IN "WALLEYE22IN"
Reviews.Content: Nothing but a toy, does not do anything as mentioned...Save your money or add to it and purchase something that works...

Reviews.Title: spy cam
Reviews.Author: george hume
Reviews.Content: This is a whole lot of fun..But i do believe that the night owl version is a little better due to being easier to operate.The video will not approach that of say a sony handy cam but hey neither does the price,,are u kidding me less than 20 and you get a video with sound? I like knowing that i can pull out this little fob and make a video any time any where.

Reviews.Title: bad buy
Reviews.Author: Rpcltd
Reviews.Content: junk, video is yellow very poor quality, would not buy another. It is ashame because 808 cameras have better video. This is a cheep imitation.

Reviews.Title: KeyChain Camear
Reviews.Author: Nageotte
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to use, has poor instructions.  It stopped working after a few uses.  I would suggest you buy a more expensive one.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: D.N.Wijewardane
Reviews.Content: Despite stating it would work on Mac, try as I might could not get it working and no manufacturer's site.Returned it.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality video. No meaningful instructions
Reviews.Author: Midnight Banker "Midnight Banker"
Reviews.Content: If you are game on figuring out how to get it to work, then it is good for the purpose.small, discrete and good video quality.I haven't mastered the mode change to take still photos yet, especially without moving it which distorts the image.

Reviews.Title: Spy cam ok for the money.
Reviews.Author: Darren Easter
Reviews.Content: Well overall its a beginner cam for the illiterate but for advance USERS. Nah. The Gui is not user friendly. there is some inconisitency with led functions. Very hard to tell if cam is on or recording or card is full . To many led functions on the same bulb. Confusing to a Unsavy user. For the price not bad though. works pretty good except for the clock setting. the instructions are very limited and in 1mm version...............Eye chockers

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: John Romero
Reviews.Content: very disdreet didnt come with a memory card but who cares it was awesome its easy to learn how to use dont listen to these dumbasses if you have half a brain u can learn and comes with a lil key chain thing but um the box is a peice of trash but i didnt buy it for a gift or anything so i dont mind

Reviews.Title: Decent quality, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Hepfer
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this item. It is easy to use and shoots decent quality video. It is better than I expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: It works, but wow, not easy
Reviews.Author: Jedadiah P. Ashford
Reviews.Content: It works, after re-reading the instructions 50x times, this 20 year IT professional finally got it working. This is so basic its rediculous. I think whoever made these ran out of money and just decided to sell them anyway. Good luck trying to get this to record and playback on a pc.

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Evan
Reviews.Content: Not the best quality of course, but it takes pictures, it takes video, it even has audio. Make sure you buy a separate memory card.

Reviews.Title: About what I expected...
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Hey, it's cheap!  What do you really expect?  Lucasfilm 3D?  Yes, it's a little grainy, but it's easy to use and small.  I bought two to mount to an RC aircraft and they get the job done.

Reviews.Title: It does not work
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Giese
Reviews.Content: It charges but the computer does not see the unit.  For $10 it is not worth my time to return it.

Reviews.Title: spy camera
Reviews.Author: Hector Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The microphone does not work and the instructions are poorly translated is impossible to follow, it is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly! didn't expect, but it works fine!
Reviews.Author: Elvira
Reviews.Content: I'm very much pleased with this purchase. Actually i did not expect the cam to work so fine for $10 price , but it does! maybe I am one from those lucky buyers, who received a cam with good quality. The video shots are bright, the sound is good. The cam works fine with 8Gb micro SD card. Manual is not that bad and one can understand it easily. To change the date/time in video shots you need to change the date/time in txt file, which is created automatically in the root of SD card, save and exit. You can take not only video in AVI, but also just pics - but they are not of that good quality :-)

Reviews.Title: Way better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Arthur Boyer
Reviews.Content: This camera was rated sooo poorly but I didn't see why. I was scared to see if it would work when it got to me but happy with the results. It has some sort of zoomed camera and if you move it the sound it terrible but, the fact that there is no indication of recording weights it out...!

Reviews.Title: great coustomer service
Reviews.Author: stumpy
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT MINE ON AMAZON. DEVICE IS CALLED  SPY HIDDEN MICRO CAMERA CCTV CAR REMOTE KEY STYLE . DID NOT EVER WORK STRAIGHT OUT OF THE BOX. AT 10.99 THEY KNOW YOU WILL NOT SEND BACK. GONNA TRY GETTING ONE FROM HD FOR 50 BUCKS. AT LEAST I CAN RETURN IT IF IT DOESENT WORK.  UPDATE....MY REVIEW WAS READ BY SENDER AND I WAS SENT A NEW ONE WHICH WORKS FINE. VERY GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE. FUN PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: No one would know it is a camera!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Montalvo-Arroyo "shanti"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for a friend. She needed to gather evidence to support a claim and this worked great for her.

Reviews.Title: The unit did not work
Reviews.Author: cubmaster
Reviews.Content: I had borrowed a similar unit from a friend and it worked just fine.The unit I received refused to take video. I tried hitting the reset button numerous time, but no luck getting the record function to work.

Reviews.Title: Ndid not work
Reviews.Author: Accessories Haven LLC
Reviews.Content: First of all, the instructions manual was written in such a way that it could not be understood. Second, the product did not work.

Reviews.Title: No video
Reviews.Author: snndn
Reviews.Content: Came broken.  Fully charged with a micro-card inserted, the unit records . . . . .sound.  Good sound quality, no image.  Not worth returning for $12.  Oh well.

Reviews.Title: Never worked.
Reviews.Author: Chris Hoagland
Reviews.Content: Directions were awful.  The camera was never recognized by my macbook as an external drive. The camera never worked, I charged it for over 4 hours.  It was not a smart purchase.

Reviews.Title: great little gadget very impressed
Reviews.Author: julane lewis
Reviews.Content: works great ,very good video for the price ,loved it so much i ordered 2 more,very easy to get video without being noticed by others ,will order more of them

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly K. Bowman "Bowmank929"
Reviews.Content: Not the best camera ever but gets the job done. The instructions are worthless, you have to go to YouTube to get decent instructions on how to use the product. The Veho VCC-003-Muvi-blk micro digital camcorder is much better and worth the difference in price (although you probably have to go to YouTube for instructions on this item too). It's got an optional voice activated record mode and wider view notice. Hope this review helps

Reviews.Title: doesn't work too well in low lighting
Reviews.Author: kourosh keikhanzadeh "blib"
Reviews.Content: that is my main complaint with this. Also the battery really runs out fast.Otherwise for the price it does a really damn good job. I should really give it one more star just because of the price but the damn thing doesn't do a good job unless the place is super well light. that's kinda annoying.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Javron
Reviews.Content: It has instructions in it, jus play with it for a while and you will figure it out, I can tell you that the back (bigger)button is the power button, then the front button is for video and pictures. You can email me if you cannot figure it out. One thing i wish it had was a small rubber cover for the connection just to cover it in disguise. But works great.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine!
Reviews.Author: kmcl
Reviews.Content: There are youtube videos galore showing how to work this.  Which is good, because the instructions are basically useless (hilarious, but useless).  Works just fine for my purpose.

Reviews.Title: It works pretty good but recorded something long an parts are missing
Reviews.Author: shannon spaid
Reviews.Content: would buy another,dont know how to change date an time. easy to use sound quality is very good small an convinted

Reviews.Title: Could be much better
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: It was quickly delievred by first class mail. The V-cam is smaller than real size car remote and looks less than real. I similarly replied to the seller for their future improvements (why not, same effort and cost to have the a real size and look...)I also own a Swann spy pen form Costco for $30. In comparison, the resolution of the Swann spy pen is much better, but I like the recording mode of this car remote V-cam as it does NOT have a flashing light when recording like the Swann spy pen (that simply broadcasts, hey guys, I'm secretly recording...)

Reviews.Title: Item Received has  NO Resemblance to item pictured
Reviews.Author: Puff n Fluff* ®™ "Puff*"
Reviews.Content: **ZERO** stars for this item.First of all the "camera" we received was not in a box as pictured.And we have not been able to try it to see if it works. Why? Well, the instructions are impossible to follow.Here are a couple of quotes from the instructions." 1. Enter the videos mode in turn off status, long time press OFF/ON button till yellow light on. long time press (video/camera button) till yellow light flash three times,light off enter into the video mode then click" "Camera mode: Enter the camera mode in turned off status long time press (OFF/ON) button till yellow light flash one time then take one photo and again and again Long time press Off/ON turn on off."They go on like that.The instructions are, at best, humorous reading.Save your money

Reviews.Title: Buyer's need to state WHERE & from which ad they purchased these cameras
Reviews.Author: Soulrider
Reviews.Content: People need to realize that these black keyfob/remote cameras are all over the internet..Amazon, Ebay, Craig's List, etc.  They all look the same but they are all different depending on where you get them from.  The case many times is the only thing that is the same.  The internals (the camera), battery, resolution, etc are all different.  Some have a HD, stutter free picture and some have a lower resolution picture that stutters and drops frames.  I suggest checking out Youtube for reviews on the various cameras and the various places that are selling them.  One of the best types of these keyfob/remote cameras with the best picture,etc is known as the 808 #11 or 808 #16.  These can ONLY be purchased on Ebay from a particular seller who is also the manufacturer from what I understand.  They cost around $25-$30 US.  All the other ones are different resolutions/batteries/quality and you really don't know what you are getting.People need to also realize that not all the reviews they are reading right now for THIS particular item being sold on Amazon are from people who bought THIS PARTICULAR ITEM ON AMAZON.  Some bought something that LOOKED the same on Ebay or Craig's List, etc.  They THINK they are helping because they think they are reviewing the same camera because it looks exactly the same.  However, they are not the same unless they bought the exact same unit HERE from THIS AD and even then they can't be 100% sure unless they know the seller.  The seller themselves might be substituting different/cheaper kefob/remote cameras from a different source.  I'm not saying they are but they COULD be.PLEASE if you leave a review of this product list WHERE you purchased it.  If you purchased it from THIS Amazon add, say so.  If you purchased it off of Ebay, say so.  That's the only way people reading it will know.  Reading a positive add for a black keyfob/remote camera bought off of Ebay will mean nothing for someone buying from this ad here on Amazon because the cameras are all different.Lastly, my actual review (number of stars) means nothing as this was just an informational post to make people aware that there are SO many different kinds of these cameras and they are all different.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't even work
Reviews.Author: Chris L
Reviews.Content: I charged the item for the last 24 hours and still it only works if it is plugged in. I didn't get it to use it as a desk camera. WORTHLESS!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Value - bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Eric Zarth
Reviews.Content: For around 10$ it's unbelievable what you can get.I have about 3 of these, for my RC planes they work great. You can put them on just about anything, and if they break or you crash your plane - who cares!? It was only 10 bucks!They take as much vid as you care to buy, i.e. a 2gb micro sd card will get you about 1hr50min's of video.A 4gb card will get you about 3hr50min's of vid and so on. I have not run the battery empty yet after more than 2hours of use.They also work great as a dash cam!Let other people pay 80$ or more for expensive dashcams, just get one of these.The only singular negative critic I can think of for this cam is that the lense is not a wideangle lense.It seems to have a focal length of about 50mm, so for example if you want to use it as a dash cam, you have to aim it just right, in this case a 35 or smaller lense would be better.But for most purposes this is a moot point.At 10 bucks just buy some and experiment!There is also a video in youtube on the controls and buttons, the instructions for this device are in the usual "chinglish" that make no sense at all.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as pictured!
Reviews.Author: Chad G. Dequevedo
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these on EBay and it worked great, so my son wanted one for his birthday. I bought this one because it looked like it came in a nice box, and it did! It works just as well as my first one. The instructions aren't the best, but read some of the other reviews here. They did a good job of explaining how to work these little things.I attach mine to my Blade MQX quad-copter. I'm hoping my son attaches his to a couple of his model rockets

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: This is like so cool it took me a few minutes to get the way it works but i got it and wow good vid and pics its worth what i payed for it will say if you are to get this you will need to get a sd chip

Reviews.Title: WORKS GREAT
Reviews.Author: FORTOLEO
Reviews.Content: WORKS GREAT, FAST AND ECONOMIC, I REALLY RECOMEND IT, AND CHEAP COMPARE TO OTHERS STORES, IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SPY CAM, THIS IS REALY GOOD

Reviews.Title: What a waste!
Reviews.Author: Dan Thrasher
Reviews.Content: What a piece of crap! Why cant anybody from foreign countries send instructions that we can understand, see, and use. This purchase and my last few purchases will definitely make me think twice abut ordering through amazon anymore. I'm getting fed up with crap like this wasting precious time.

Reviews.Title: spy cam
Reviews.Author: john simpson
Reviews.Content: it's cool and easy use only problem that later it turns off and on by it's self which really made meupset

Reviews.Title: key camera
Reviews.Author: clayton stewart
Reviews.Content: i can not tell how it really works vecause it did not come with info on how to use or a memory card to use online explaining how to use it  and the buttons are hard to push. the company put on amazon as new whixh by looks is true but no ibfo changes mymind,i tried to get company info and i couldn't get any with no shipping label.

Reviews.Title: bad product
Reviews.Author: jim easley
Reviews.Content: Bought this product in April and after 2 4-5 min recordings it just completely quite working...big waste of money. Decided to just take the hit cause with cost to ship it back i would loose more money....total junk

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: makara
Reviews.Content: i like it a lot of this service and I'm look forward to buy more from this store and i will let all my friend know bout this store... thank you for your service and perfect Item.... thank you

Reviews.Title: Too hard to find the right one
Reviews.Author: T. Haro "Tharo"
Reviews.Content: I wanted the HD one and reading the ElectroFlip description I thought I had it but didn't. This one is the pits!

Reviews.Title: You really do get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Robert Revell
Reviews.Content: It worked for all on 2 minutes... won't stay on for more than 5 seconds after 4 hours of charging...

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Trust these bad reviews...Got it, wouldn't recongize in either mac nor Windows. Don' make the same mistake I did and think you're going to get a good product, you're not.

Reviews.Title: Nice purchase for the price
Reviews.Author: F. Niaz
Reviews.Content: My only gripe about this little device is that my output video is extremely shaky if I am moving ever so slightly. You literally have to be still when using this device. Other than that it's a cool little device and won't break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad
Reviews.Author: Aramaki
Reviews.Content: Followed the instructions, and it works as it said, the video quality for this type of tiny device and price is obviously not going to be very good. Also the sound recording is a bit faint. But it gets the job done!

Reviews.Title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lori A. Payne
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT 3 OF THESE BECAUSE OF THE GOOD FEEDBACK. ALL THREE CHARGED FINE AFTER REMOVING FROM CHARGER, NO LIGHTS, COULD NOT TELL IF ON OR OFF. COULD NOT TAKE PICTURES OR VIDEOS. NEW INSTRUCTIONS ARE INCLUDED AND CAN BE UNDERSTOOD. FOLLOWED INSTRUCTIONS AND NOTHING. THOUGHT WE WERE DOING SOMETHING WRONG, HOW COULD ALL 3 BE BAD, WELL THEY WERE AND WILL BE RETURNED. DONT TAKE THE CHANCE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing little camera
Reviews.Author: newbie2012
Reviews.Content: charging time initially is about 4-5 hours.  Go to this link to get the direction how to set clock on the camera:I have bought two of these.  One came in a official box and the other one which was 80 cents cheaper came in a plastic bag.  Both worked well.  Window XP did not have a problem recognizing it.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: swemando
Reviews.Content: this is not a bad little device, comes in a nice box and works well, easy to operate, video footage is ok.

Reviews.Title: hidden spy camera
Reviews.Author: Teila Kim Alexander
Reviews.Content: Item was brand new and in excellent condition. It arrived ahead of schedule. The picture quality of the camera was very poor but sound's quality was decent for the price. As with most electronics, you get what you pay for. It also was a bit aggrevating due to it only having two small button's that controlled all of the functions. It was hard to tell if you were recording or not.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to see what my cat would be up to by placing this around his collar. I got the camera and tossed the instructions as they were rediculous to read. But it was pretty easy to work BUT the damned thing didnt even recognize my sandisk. Then when I tried to take it out and back in it basically ate my sandisk. I now have to break the thing apart just to get my sandisk. I knew when I originally bought this that It would be a gamble. Don't gamble your money on this it's not worth it. I hope this helped.

Reviews.Title: where is my camera?
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: the camera isn't here yet, i continue waiting, when is it going to be here? i need it! please i really need it

Reviews.Title: THANK YOU
Reviews.Author: alex depeiza
Reviews.Content: I WISH TO SAY THANKS AN I WILL LET YOU NO FURTHER ABOUT USING MY PRODUCT I HAVEN'T RECEIVE IT AS YET I NO I HAVE THE CONFIDENCE IT WILL ARRIVE SOON

Reviews.Title: Does not work gadgets from China
Reviews.Author: SBPoet
Reviews.Content: These things made in China does not work. Only the light blinks 3 times. Please tell us before hand where is this made and not waste our time, money and energy. Please make a complete refund of $25.16. Thanks.Please market only products made in Japan, Hong Kong and Korea.

Then it will go off that means you are recording the video now I will explain to you how you make the pictures you would hit the big button it will blink twice it will stay on steady then you hit the small button once then you will see the links one time that means you just made one picture do you get that so far but please don't ask me stupid question but that does not make any sense to me I have it for four weeks I don't have no problems with it "videos pictures "I don't have any problems at all either one of those two. And also I am making dvd's out of it and that's why I am having so much fun with it " GREAT KEYCHAIN CAMERA HIDDEN MICRO CAMERA CCTV CAR REMOTE KEY STYLE " I WISH THEIR WHERE MORE STARS .I been had this " keychain Camera HIDDEN MICRO CAMERA CCTV CAR REMOTE KEY STYLE " for 7 mouth's in 4 days I have had no problem's at all and also I can record up to 30 min's of video's if I had 64GB's then able to record up to 1 hour of video's and it's the thing I ever buy for cheapest price it work's real great .I have had it for 9 mouth's in 2 day and working real great keychain camera and also I don't have no problems at all I am amkeing video's with it make it into dvd and make funny video's and I haveing so much fun with it .

Reviews.Title: keychain fell apart
Reviews.Author: Rayne
Reviews.Content: Three days after the camera arrived the chain broke.  Unfortunately, I didn't notice in time and god only knows what stretch of road it fell off.The camera itself works pretty great, but what good is that when it is lost so easily and quickly? :(

Reviews.Title: whair,s the box
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: i dont have nothing to say  everything i have ben buying the past 6 mounths have just ben turning into junk or came junck already

ProductInfo.Name: SPY HIDDEN MICRO CAMERA CCTV CAR REMOTE KEY STYLE
